Title: S&P USA Ventilation Systems Premium Choice EC Fan Models
Summary: S&P USA Ventilation Systems has expanded its Premium Choice (PCD) Series to include the PCD300 and PCD150 ceiling mount exhaust fans and the PCD300IL inline fresh air supply/exhaust fan. S&P USA designs and manufactures a broad range of ventilation equipment, including fans rated up to over 50,000 CFM, serving residential and commercial applications. The new PCD fans will expand the residential bath fan series from its prior 150-CFM airflow maximum capacity into the light commercial range of up to 300-CFM. With new airflow capacities, these models are ideal for restrooms and ventilation zones in offices, restaurants, warehouses, and other similar facilities.

Title: Panasonic Intelli-Balance Elite and Elite Plus+ Series
Summary: Panasonic has announced the launch of its Intelli-Balance Elite and Elite Plus+ Series of energy recovery ventilators (ERV). Designed to deliver superior performance throughout the climate spectrum, from extreme cold to hot, humid conditions, these innovative models are engineered to address modern building standards and cater to a diverse range of consumer needs. Newly designed to deliver year-round performance, the Intelli-Balance Elite series continuously exchanges stale indoor air with fresh, filtered air, recovering energy from the outgoing air to maximize energy efficiency. Now with the ability to function effectively in temperatures as low as -13 degrees Fahrenheit, the new models achieve an impressive 90 percent sensible recovery efficiency (SRE) rating and reduced cubic feet per minute (CFM) loss at static pressure.
